relation: We have cops and emergency stations through out campus.
We got a club for almost everything, anime, swimming, french, engineering. You name it we go it!
The cafeteria is the place to go! If you will be staying 5 days a week for long periods of time get a meal plan.
There plenty of activities at the student union, it just takes a peek to find out.
We have some of the best food in our cafeteria for really good prices. The dishes are really varied. We have food for those who want to diet, those who wanted to bulk up, even food for vegetarians.
I do not live in a dorm but according to my friends, there are plenty of night time and afternoon activities for those who live there. There is movie night, the campus's gym and a lot more.
Some classes can get quite difficult while other may seem like a breeze. The truth of the matter is, if you do pay attention and you do the work you will be set for the next 4-6 years.
Find a mentor ASAP, there is so much you can learn about the campus and the college life and opportunities by getting a mentor or joining an association or society.

Its a new place I like to call home, it has brought me much joy and sorrow in the last 4 years. But I have learned from my time in there that it docent matter how hard it gets as long as I keep trying.
pageTitle: The University of Texas-Pan American (UTPA) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {549705=It is very inexpensive with lots of opportunity available for students looking for a great start. It serves the local community very well, sponsoring events, etc. I have enjoyed my time here quite a lot and is recommended especially if you can tolerate the area's 9 month long summer (March - October)., 207466=1-suicide 2012 2-robbies and attackes in the parking lot but thats about it, 289596=UTPA is a great college. The campus is expanding in many ways including its parking. Having attended Texas State University in 2002 I can say for a college it offers everything along with many opportunities to network and get the full college experience., 626930=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 266574=The University of Texas-Pan American is a campus that I've been attending since 2005 and now going for my masters. The faculty are very helpful and do their best to help make my time here effortless. However, the paperwork to apply for admission has been total confusion from the start and I felt that I was getting nowhere for quite some time.}
